text: And ye shall divide the land by lot for an inheritance among your families: and to the more ye shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer ye shall give the less inheritance: every man’s inheritance shall be in the place where his lot falleth; according to the tribes of your fathers ye shall inherit.33.54 give the more…: Heb. multiply his inheritance33.54 give the less…: Heb. diminish his inheritance
